item.title: Live course review: Introduction to encryption by Michael Pound
item.description: Live course review: Introduction to encryption by Michael Pound This is the first review I do about courses or lectures, they are mostly notes and personal considerations.

item.title: Set up a static website with Hugo, Forestry and GitHub Pages
item.description: I’m moving a private knowledge base powered by WordPress to a public blog so I seized the opportunity to study a static site generator like Jekyll.
